ygData.subject: Levitate..
ygData.msgSnippet: Since this most recent patch, has anyone else (with the clickable boots) been having levitate fade with either 1 red warning message or sometimes no red
ygData.messageBody:
Since this most recent patch, has anyone else (with the clickable boots) been having levitate fade with either 1 red warning message or sometimes no red warning messages? I know for sure that there used to be 2 red warning messages giving me enough time to re-click my boots, but now I can hardly if ever react fast enough to do it and end up falling often. I don't have a caster character with levitate though so I can't check if its the same for them, but for my bard this is a very annoying change =(


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
